package CSCI125hw;

public class integerhw2 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int y=1;
		int x=20;
		System.out.println(x+y);
	}

}
//pt3
package CSCI125hw;

public class addinginteger {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int x=20;
		System.out.println(++x);
				
	}

}
